languages.text: "Ваш род распространился по галактике, словно зараза по изможденному телу. Быть может, повин{mf|ен|на} и не лично ты, но именно мон-кай несут ответственность за то, что случилось. За то, что сделал твой жалкий род с величественным миром-кораблем, несущим миллионы жизней Детей Азуриана сквозь звездные туманности и холод вселенной! Как мон-кай отобрали его у нас? Выжгли вены ядом и осквернили кровь?" {n}Кристальные слезы скатываются по щеке эльдара.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваш род распространился по галактике, словно зараза по изможденному телу. Быть может повин{mf|ен|на} и не лично ты, но именно мон-кай несут ответственно за то, что случилось. За то, что сделал твой жалкий род с величественным миром-кораблем, несущим миллионы жизней Детей Азуриана сквозь звездные туманности и холод вселенной? Как мон-кай отобрали его у нас? Выжгли вены ядом и осквернили кровь?" {n}Кристальные слезы скатываются по щеке эльдара.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваш род распространился по галактике, словно зараза по изможденному телу. Быть может, повин{mf|ен|на} и не лично ты, но именно мон-кай несут ответственность за то, что случилось. За то, что сделал твой жалкий род с величественным миром-кораблем, несущим миллионы жизней Детей Азуриана сквозь звездные туманности и холод вселенной! Как мон-кай отобрали его у нас? Выжгли вены ядом и осквернили кровь?" {n}Кристальные слезы скатываются по щеке эльдара.{/n}

Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it away from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Tu dinastía se ha extendido por toda la galaxia como una infección se propaga por un cuerpo maltrecho. Quizá la culpa no sea tuya personalmente, pero los mon-keigh son los responsables de lo que ha sucedido: ¡de lo que tu miserable dinastía le hizo a un majestuoso mundo astronave que transportaba millones de vidas Asuryani a través del frío cósmico tachonado de estrellas y decorado con nebulosas! ¿Acaso no sabes ni lamentas cuánto nos han arrebatado los mon-keigh? ¿Que nos quemaran las venas y nos corrompieran la sangre con su ponzoña?». {n}Unas lágrimas cristalinas surcan las mejillas del Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tu dinastía se ha extendido por toda la galaxia como una infección se propaga por un cuerpo maltrecho. Quizá la culpa no sea tuya personalmente, pero los mon-keigh son los responsables de lo que ha sucedido: de lo que tu miserable dinastía le hizo a un majestuoso mundo astronave que transportaba millones de vidas Asuryani a través del frío cósmico tachonado de estrellas y decorado con nebulosas. ¿Acaso no sabes ni lamentas cuánto nos han arrebatado los mon-keigh? ¿Que nos quemaran las venas y nos corrompieran la sangre con su ponzoña?». {n}Unas lágrimas cristalinas surcan las mejillas del Aeldari.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「疲れた体を通して感染が広がったように、お前の王朝は銀河系全体に広がった。お前個人に落ち度はないかもしれないが、起こったことの責任はモン＝ケイにある…ちりばめられた星と星雲が覆う宇宙の寒さの中、何百万ものアシュリヤーニの命を運んでいた壮大な方舟に、お前たちの惨めな王朝がをしたことの責任がね。お前は、モン＝ケイが我々の舟を奪ったことを知らないのか、というか、気にもしないのか？我らの血管を毒で焼き、血を汚したことも？」{n} アエルダリの頬を水晶の涙が伝った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「疲れた体を通して感染が広がったように、お前の王朝は銀河系全体に広がった。お前個人に落ち度はないかもしれないが、起こったことの責任はモン＝ケイにある…ちりばめられた星と星雲が覆う宇宙の寒さの中、何百万ものアシュリヤーニの命を運んでいた壮大な方舟に、お前たちの惨めな王朝がをしたことの責任がね。お前は、モン＝ケイが我々の舟を奪ったことを知らないのか、というか、気にもしないのか？我らの血管を毒で焼き、血を汚したことも？」{n} アエルダリの頬を水晶の涙が伝った。{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你的王朝遍布整个银河系，就像感在病重的躯体上到处蔓延一样。或许你个人确实没做错什么，但猴子必须要为发生的一切负责。就是你那该死的王朝，摧毁了我们宏伟的方舟世界。那座方舟世界载着数百万方舟灵族，穿越布满群星的冰冷宇宙，跨过其中的无数星云！猴子从我们手中夺走了它，用毒液灼伤我们的血管，腐蚀我们的血脉。这一切，难道你不知道，不在乎吗？”{n}晶莹的泪水顺着艾达灵族的脸颊流下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你的王朝遍布整个银河系，就像感染扩散到了整个病重的躯体一样。或许你个人确实没做错什么，但猴子必须要为发生的一切负责。就是你那该死的王朝，摧毁了我们宏伟的方舟世界。那座方舟世界载着数百万方舟灵族，穿越布满群星的冰冷宇宙，跨过其中的无数星云。猴子是怎么从我们手中夺走了它，用毒液灼伤我们的血管，腐蚀我们的血脉。这一切，难道你不知道，不在乎吗？”{n}晶莹的泪水顺着艾达灵族的脸颊流下。{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Votre dynastie s'est répandue dans la galaxie tout entière telle une infection dans un corps éreinté. Vous n'êtes peut-être pas personnellement en faute, mais ce sont bien les mon-keigh qui sont responsables de ce qui s'est passé... de ce que votre misérable dynastie a fait au majestueux vaisseau-monde qui transportait des millions d'Asuryanis à travers l'hiver cosmique parsemé d'étoiles et drapé de nébuleuses. Ce que les mon-keigh nous ont pris vous est-il égal ? Ne vous en souvenez-vous pas ? Ne vous rappelez-vous pas la manière dont ils ont brûlé nos veines de leur venin et corrompu notre sang ? » {n}Des larmes cristallines coulent sur les joues de l'Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre dynastie s'est répandue dans la galaxie tout entière telle une infection dans un corps éreinté. « Vous n'êtes peut-être pas personnellement en faute, mais ce sont bien les mon-keigh qui sont responsables de ce qui s'est passé... de ce que votre misérable dynastie a fait au majestueux vaisseau-monde qui transportait des millions d'Asuryanis à travers l'hiver cosmique parsemé d'étoiles et drapé de nébuleuses. Ce que les mon-keigh nous ont pris vous est-il égal ? Ne vous en souvenez-vous pas ? Ne vous rappelez-vous pas la manière dont ils ont brûlé nos veines de leur venin et corrompu notre sang ? » {n}Des larmes cristallines coulent sur les joues de l'Aeldari.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wie eine Infektion in einem müden Körper hat sich Eure Dynastie in der gesamten Galaxie ausgebreitet. Vielleicht ist es nicht Eure persönliche Schuld, aber dafür die der Chem-Pan-Sey – sie sind verantwortlich dafür, was Eure jämmerliche Dynastie unserem majestätischen Weltenschiff angetan hat. Es war das Zuhause für Millionen von Asuryani auf ihrer Reise durch die kosmische Kälte, übersät mit Sternen und eingehüllt von Nebeln. Wisst Ihr denn nicht oder ist es Euch völlig egal, dass Chem-Pan-Sey es uns weggenommen haben? Dass sie Gift in unsere Adern gebracht und unser Blut verderbt haben?" {n}Kristallene Tränen laufen dem Aeldari die Wange runter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie eine Infektion in einem müden Körper hat sich Eure Dynastie in der gesamten Galaxie ausgebreitet. Vielleicht ist es nicht Eure persönliche Schuld, aber dafür die der Chem-Pan-Sey – sie sind verantwortlich dafür, was Eure jämmerliche Dynastie unserem majestätischen Weltenschiff angetan hat. Es war das Zuhause für Millionen von Asuryani auf ihrer Reise durch durch die kosmische Kälte, übersät mit Sternen und eingehüllt von Nebeln. Wisst Ihr denn nicht oder ist es Euch völlig egal, dass Chem-Pan-Sey es uns weggenommen haben? Dass sie Gift in unsere Adern gebracht und unser Blut verderbt haben?" {n}Kristallene Tränen laufen dem Aeldari die Wange runter.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Hanedanlığın, bitkin bir vücuda yayılan enfeksiyon misali tüm galaksiye yayılmış. Bizzat bir şey yapmamış olsan da tüm o yaşananlar, mon-keighlerin suçu. Yıldızlarla süslü, nebulalarla kaplı kozmik soğuğun zorluklarına göğüs geren milyonlarca Asuryani'nin yaşadığı o ihtişamlı gemidünyanın başına gelenler, sefil hanedanlığının suçu! Mon-keighlerin onu bizden çaldıklarını, damarlarımızı zehirle yakıp kanımızı yozlaştırdıklarını bilmiyor musun? Yoksa bilmezlikten mi geliyorsun?" {n}Aeldari'nin yanaklarından kristal gözyaşları dökülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your dynasty has spread all over the galaxy as infection spreads through a weary body. You may not personally be at fault, but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for what happened — for what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae! Do you not know or care that mon-keigh took it from us? That they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlığın, bitkin bir bedene yayılan enfeksiyon misali tüm galaksiye yayılmış. Şahsi olarak bir hatan olmasa da tüm o yaşananlar, mon-keighlerin suçu. Yıldızlarla süslenmiş ve nebulalarla kaplanmış kozmik soğukluğun zorluklarına göğüs geren milyonlarca Asuryani'nin yaşadığı o ihtişamlı gemidünyaya yapılanlar, sefil hanedanlığının suçu! Mon-keighlerin bizden onu çaldıklarını, damarlarımızı zehirle yakıp kanımızı yozlaştırdıklarını bilmiyor musun yoksa umursamıyor musun?" {n}Aeldari'nin yanaklarından kristal gözyaşları dökülüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
